015package com.google.common.eventbus;
016
017
018/**
019 * Handler for exceptions thrown by event subscribers.
020 *
021 * @since 16.0
022 */
023public interface SubscriberExceptionHandler {
024  /** Handles exceptions thrown by subscribers. */
025  void handleException(Throwable exception, SubscriberExceptionContext context);
026}
